recipe.title: Peanut Drinking Snack
ingredients: 2 serrano chiles, seeds removed, finely chopped
11/2 cups salted, dry-roasted skin-on Spanish peanuts
instructions: Combine onion, chiles, lime zest and lime juice, and a large pinch of salt in a medium bowl. Let sit a minute or so to allow flavors to come together and for onion to mellow. Add peanuts, cilantro, and chili powder to onion mixture and give it all a good toss. Taste and season with more salt as needed. Serve peanut mixture in a small bowl with spoons.
